name: Posh
headline: Making sustainable batteries
description: We design, develop and manufacture sustainable battery solutions.

founders.name: Wesley Zheng, Founder
founders.description: Previously co-founder of Volansi (YC W'17, $75M raised), Stanford PhD focusing on batteries. Named Innovator Under 35 by MIT Technology Review

founders.name: Minh Chung Hoang, Founder
founders.description:
Love building things that people love.
Roboticist at heart! Built all sorts of bots (underwater, above water, ground, above ground, etc.).
Graduated with Aerospace engineering degree. Had years of experience in robotics, embedded systems and computer vision.

generated_description:
Posh is a company on a mission to create sustainable battery solutions. Founded in 2022 and incubated in Y Combinator's W22 batch, Posh is located in the heart of San Francisco and operates with a lean team of four.

What sets Posh apart is its commitment to environmentally-friendly energy storage, which taps into the increasing demand for sustainability in technology. Their focus is on designing, developing, and manufacturing batteries that don't just power devices but do so in a way that minimizes environmental impact.

Diana Hu serves as their Group Partner, guiding the company towards innovative solutions in the ever-evolving fields of energy storage and climate technology. Posh is at the intersection of robotics and climatetech, embodying the ethos of innovation with a conscience.

For more information, you can visit their website at [poshrobotics.com](https://www.poshrobotics.com/). 

With the growing need for clean energy alternatives, Posh is not just participating in a trendâ€”it's shaping the future of sustainable technology. Keep an eye on them; they might just be the spark that ignites change in the energy landscape.
